title: 'Worth buying'
body: 'Product is of good quality and will be durable.'

title: 'A bit crudely made
column5: 'Useful for A4 size papers. Legal papers are bigger. The size mentioned is for the outer border
column7: which makes the inner space smaller. Therefore B4 size paper edges will bend and crumple inside.'

title: 'Misleading representation'
body: 'In photo shown 5 pcs but actually it is 2 pcs.'

title: '3x overpriced'
body: 'This item is highly overpriced. I bought 2 folders for 299. Few daya later found same dolder for rs 56 each at corner stationary shop. Not worth the money.'

title: 'Misleading picture'
body: Picture shows 5 folders, but you are actually buying only 2 folders.  It says 2 in the Description but your focus is on the picture, which shows 5 folders.  It's too costly for 2 folders.

title: 'Size too small for full scap papers.'
body: It is a complete waste of money. Legal size papers don't fit into these folders. Also very slim. So just a few sheets of A4 size papers can go in. Definitely not value for money. Can't say about durability as I cannot use it.

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Ok quality good and fit to size'
